text: The comparison of IHC scores among the different sections of the oviduct identified the infundibulum as the section recording the highest values ( Table 2 ) . IHC positivity was mostly limited to the nuclei and cytoplasm of the mucosal epithelia , even though we observed a specific and intense staining at the level of the serosal surface of the oviduct in 2 / 7 and 1 / 7 birds , on days 4 and 6 , respectively .
